titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Kappa Epsilon Society was a group of Presbyterian ministers from the Troy, New York, area who met to foster fellowship and intellectual, social, and spiritual culture.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes of the Kappa Epsilon Society, 1880-1959. The monthly meeting minutes document routine business, titles of papers read at meetings, and brief memorials of deceased members. The volumes also include historical sketches of the Society, rolls of officers and members, attendance records, places and dates of meetings, dockets, and copies of the Society's constitution. There is one group photograph, dated 1939 (subjects are not identified).

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
